pullrequest.title: Re-wrote the instructions to specify gazebo plugins within a ROS URDF file.

content.raw:
I didn’t mention them, because the title of the tutorial is “Using Gazebo plugins with ROS”. As I understand it, it talks about what plugins you can call and use through a URDF file.

So, for example, you can't use a `WorldPlugin` in this case, because a URDF cannot specify a `` `<world>` `` tag from a URDF. Am I wrong?
content.html:
I didn’t mention them, because the title of the tutorial is “Using Gazebo plugins with ROS”. As I understand it, it talks about what plugins you can call and use through a URDF file.

So, for example, you can't use a WorldPlugin in this case, because a URDF cannot specify a `<world>` tag from a URDF. Am I wrong?
